title: Swinging Arm - Inspection

body.body: Check the swinging arm bearings for damage, pitting, and cracks. Replace as necessary.
Inspect the swinging arm spindle for damage and deformation. Replace as necessary.
Check the swinging arm for damage. Replace as necessary.
Check all bearing seals for damage, splits etc. Replace as necessary.
